TYPE_NAME_OF_EXISTING_ITEM: Type the name of an existing content item. Matches will be shown as you type.
ALTERNATIVE_DISPLAY_NAME: Alternative display name (for this page only)
ENTER_NEW_DISPLAY_NAME: Enter a new display name for the item if the original name is not apporpriate for this placement.
ENTER_A_DESCRIPTION: Enter a description to display with this content.
